title: Ticket #5623: condor_submit_dag fails if DAG file name contains spaces
description:
Just tried running condor_submit_dag on a DAG file name that contains spaces, and I got this error: 

  Submitting job(s)
  ERROR: The 'output' takes exactly one argument (foo bar.dag.lib.out)
  ERROR: condor_submit failed; aborting.

So condor_submit_dag is not correctly quoting the output, error, and log values in the .condor.sub file if the DAG file name has spaces...
creator: wenger
